sourcesContent:
Directives *ngIf

Hello User

Directives *ngIf and Else

Hello User is Created Successfully.

No User is Created, Please click to create the User

 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-directives', templateUrl: './directives.component.html', styleUrls: ['./directives.component.css'], }) export class DirectivesComponent { isUserCreated: boolean = false; createUser() { this.isUserCreated = true; } }
